task1.name: Standard
task1.desc: Design a balanced chip with a well-matched ratio of performance, energy and area.

task2.name: High Performance
task2.desc: Maximize performance for high-end applications. High budget but challenging.

task3.name: Low Power
task3.desc: Build a chip for ultra-low power and compact area.

custom.name: Custom Design
custom.desc: Create any chip design – no restrictions at all.
